00001 package newtonERP.orm.associations;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Collection;
00004 import java.util.Hashtable;
00005 import java.util.Vector;

00007 import newtonERP.common.ModuleLoader;
00008 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00009 import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.FlagPool;
00010 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00011 
00017 public class FlagPoolManager
00018 {
00024         public static void applyFlagPoolChanges(AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity,
00025                         Iterable<FlagPool> flagPoolList,
00026                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00027         {
00028                 for (FlagPool flagPool : flagPoolList)
00029                         applyFlagPoolChanges(sourceEntity, flagPool, parameters);
00030         }
00031 
00032         private static void applyFlagPoolChanges(AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity,
00033                         FlagPool flagPool, Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00034 
00035         {
00036                 flagPool.query(sourceEntity.getPrimaryKeyName(), sourceEntity
00037                                 .getPrimaryKeyValue());
00038 
00039                 Collection<String> availableElementList = flagPool
00040                                 .getAvailableElementList().values();
00041 
00042                 for (String availableElement : availableElementList)
00043                 {
00044 
00045                         AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity = getSearchEntity(sourceEntity,
00046                                         flagPool, availableElement);
00047 
00048                         if (parameters.containsKey(availableElement))
00049                         {
00050                                 Orm.insertUnique(searchEntity);
00051                         }
00052                         else
00053                         {
00054                                 Orm.delete(searchEntity);
00055                         }
00056 
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 flagPool.query(sourceEntity.getPrimaryKeyName(), sourceEntity
00060                                 .getPrimaryKeyValue());
00061 
00062         }
00063 
00064         private static AbstractOrmEntity getSearchEntity(
00065                         AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity, FlagPool flagPool,
00066                         String elementName)
00067         {
00068                 if (elementName.contains("."))
00069                 {
00070                         elementName = elementName.substring(
00071                                         elementName.lastIndexOf('.') + 1).trim();
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 int keyIn = sourceEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue();
00075                 int keyOut = Integer.parseInt(elementName);
00076 
00077                 String intermediateKeyInName = flagPool.getIntermediateKeyIn();
00078                 String intermediateKeyOutName = flagPool.getIntermediateKeyOut();
00079 
00080                 AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity;
00081                 try
00082                 {
00083                         searchEntity = flagPool.getIntermediateEntityDefinition()
00084                                         .getClass().newInstance();
00085                 } catch (InstantiationException e)
00086                 {
00087                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00088                 } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00089                 {
00090                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00091                 }
00092                 searchEntity.setData(intermediateKeyInName, keyIn);
00093                 searchEntity.setData(intermediateKeyOutName, keyOut);
00094                 return searchEntity;
00095         }
00096 
00101         public static final void addFlagPool(AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity,
00102                         AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntityDefinition)
00103         {
00104 
00105                 AbstractOrmEntity intermediateEntityDefinition = buildIntermediateEntityDefinition(
00106                                 sourceEntity, foreignEntityDefinition);
00107 
00108                 String intermediateKeyIn = sourceEntity.getForeignKeyName();
00109                 String intermediateKeyOut = foreignEntityDefinition.getForeignKeyName();
00110 
00111                 addFlagPool(sourceEntity, foreignEntityDefinition.getNaturalKeyName(),
00112                                 intermediateEntityDefinition, intermediateKeyIn,
00113                                 intermediateKeyOut, foreignEntityDefinition,
00114                                 foreignEntityDefinition.getPrimaryKeyName(),
00115                                 foreignEntityDefinition.getNaturalKeyNameList());
00116         }
00117 
00118         private static AbstractOrmEntity buildIntermediateEntityDefinition(
00119                         AbstractOrmEntity entity1, AbstractOrmEntity entity2)
00120 
00121         {
00122                 String entityName1, entityName2, intermediateEntityName;
00123 
00124                 entityName1 = entity1.getSystemName();
00125                 entityName2 = entity2.getSystemName();
00126 
00127                 if (entityName1.compareTo(entityName2) < 0)
00128                         intermediateEntityName = entityName1 + entityName2;
00129                 else
00130                         intermediateEntityName = entityName2 + entityName1;
00131 
00132                 String classPath = entity1.getClass().getName();
00133                 classPath = classPath.substring(0, classPath.lastIndexOf('.'));
00134 
00135                 intermediateEntityName = classPath + "." + intermediateEntityName;
00136 
00137                 AbstractOrmEntity intermediateEntityDefinition;
00138                 try
00139                 {
00140                         intermediateEntityDefinition = (AbstractOrmEntity) ModuleLoader
00141                                         .loadClass(intermediateEntityName).newInstance();
00142                 } catch (InstantiationException e)
00143                 {
00144                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00145                 } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00146                 {
00147                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00148                 }
00149 
00150                 intermediateEntityDefinition.initFields();
00151 
00152                 return intermediateEntityDefinition;
00153         }
00154 
00171         private static void addFlagPool(AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity,
00172                         String visibleDescription,
00173                         AbstractOrmEntity intermediateEntityDefinition,
00174                         String intermediateKeyIn, String intermediateKeyOut,
00175                         AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntityDefinition, String foreignKey,
00176                         Vector<String> foreignDescriptionUiControls)
00177         {
00178                 FlagPool flagPool = new FlagPool(sourceEntity, visibleDescription,
00179                                 intermediateEntityDefinition, intermediateKeyIn,
00180                                 intermediateKeyOut, foreignEntityDefinition, foreignKey,
00181                                 foreignDescriptionUiControls);
00182 
00183                 sourceEntity.addPositiveFlagPool(visibleDescription, flagPool);
00184                 foreignEntityDefinition.addNegativeFlagPool(visibleDescription,
00185                                 flagPool);
00186         }
00187 }
